metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10231 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Teclib GLPI before 9.4.1.1 is affected by a PHP type juggling vulnerability allowing bypass of authentication. This occurs in Auth::checkPassword() (inc/auth.class.php).

notes.Note: ebarretto> Only supported behind an authenticated HTTP zone

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
